lines.text: Sometimes we have to tell lies to get to the truth.
There are those who say Mackey raped her, that he took advantage of her. But Martha wouldn't say that. She called it love. And maybe it was.
You don't have to lie, Martha.
I'm a professional asshole. I gotta find a new line of work. This is taking its toll.
If there's a God out there he's gotta be laughing.
